Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: A stream cuts the road to the northwest, but vanishes quickly.
Room.LongDescription: The road continues to slope downward to the west and upward to the east. This is a strange land, with a forest on the north and a desert on the south. There are stories in the city pubs of a nomadic race of people who live on the K'tral, and of huge sandworms which burrough deep under the hot dunes. Looking across the desert you tend to not believe that anything could live out there.
